channel.title: Custom Item
channel.description: I want to add a custom items to my server. The items I want to add is dragon wings. How would I go about adding this? Please let me know. Thanks. :)

item.title: Custom Item
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

I had to spoon feed.

Okay.

One- Get the models(.rars), and put them in your ‘models’ folder. This folder would be located in your client folder.

Then, go into class8, then put it somewhere, some place where it fits in.

Then go into item.cfg! Located in the ‘config’ folder.

Do you what you want in there, just copy a cape and put it at the end of your item.cfg .

Then, change the item id, to the item id you wish. You might want to change the name?

Then, go into your item.java(not item.cfg!), search the type of item it is(for example, cape. You’d search cape.) Then put the item id in there.

Finished, you have now added a custom item!

Read full topic
